alert.note: Alert for Bell; Knox; McCreary; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 4:28PM EST until January 01 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bell County in southeastern Kentucky... Knox County in southeastern Kentucky... East central McCreary County in south central Kentucky... Central Whitley County in south central Kentucky... * Until 500 PM EST. * At 427 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Krupp, or 7 miles west of Williamsburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Goldbug around 435 PM EST. Rockholds around 440 PM EST. Perkins around 445 PM EST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Dishman Springs, Barbourville and Bimble. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for south central and southeastern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
